translation.en: [narrator] On the Motherworld, one thousand kings ruled unchallenged in succession.
translation.it: Sul Mondo Madre, mille re si erano avvicendati indisturbati.

translation.en: But in the royal bloodline's lust for power,
translation.it: Ma la sete dei reali era tale

translation.en: they consumed everything upon their planet.
translation.it: da consumare tutte le risorse del pianeta.

translation.en: The Realm marched its armies into the vastness of space,
translation.it: Il Regno mandò i propri eserciti nella vastità dello spazio

translation.en: conquering everything in its path.
The glory of the Motherworld seemed without end
translation.it: La gloria del Mondo Madre sembrava infinita

translation.en: until the treachery of an assassin's blade struck down the King and Queen,
translation.it: finché una lama infida e assassina si abbatté sul Re e sulla Regina,

translation.en: severing the royal bloodline forever.
translation.it: ponendo fine per sempre alla stirpe reale.

translation.en: In the chaotic aftermath of the King's death,
translation.it: Nel caos successivo alla morte del Re,

translation.en: several conquered planets on the edge of the Motherworld's reach
translation.it: diversi pianeti conquistati dal Mondo Madre

translation.en: began to whisper of revolution.
A senator named Balisarius used the opportunity to seize power,
translation.it: Un senatore di nome Balisarius colse l'occasione per prendere il potere

translation.en: declaring himself regent.
As a show of strength, he sent his most brutal commander
translation.it: Come segno di forza, mandò il suo comandante più violento

translation.en: into the outer reaches of the Motherworld's dominion
translation.it: ai confini estremi del dominio del Mondo Madre

translation.en: to find and crush without mercy
translation.it: per trovare e distruggere senza pietà

translation.en: those who would call themselves rebel.
[man] Kora. Kora!
I thought you were finished.
Everyone's up in the Longhouse.
-These are my last rows and I'll be done. -All right.
translation.it: - Mi mancano gli ultimi solchi. - D'accordo.

translation.en: Okay.
Den was asking where you were.
He and his brother got a big snow-elk, male.
translation.it: Lui e il fratello hanno preso un grosso alce.

translation.en: He wanted you to see it before he dressed it.
Why was he asking for me?
Well, you know, because he's…
I, I just thought… I just thought…
You thought?
-Move up. -[uraki groans]
It's been a while since we've had fresh meat. Forgot how good it is.
translation.it: Non mangiavamo carne fresca da un po'. Non ricordavo fosse così buona.

translation.en: [man] Den said they saw the summer herds returning.
translation.it: Den ha detto che le mandrie stanno rientrando.

translation.en: Maybe three days' ride away.
translation.it: Sono a circa tre giorni da qui.

translation.en: -He was asking for you. -[Kora] I heard.
translation.it: - Ha chiesto di te. - L'ho saputo.

translation.en: And, yes, it's quite impressive.
Which one? The animal?
Or…
Or the hunter?
[villager] Hey!
My people,
it is my duty as the head of this community
translation.it: è mio dovere come capo di questa comunità

translation.en: to remind you that the gods of the harvest demand a tribute.
translation.it: ricordarvi che gli dei del raccolto esigono un tributo.

translation.en: [villager] Yeah.
[leader] An offering.
But we all know it is the thrusting of hips…
translation.it: Ma sappiamo tutti che sono i movimenti dei fianchi

translation.en: …and the loud sounds of pleasure that summon the seedlings to sprout.
translation.it: e i gemiti di piacere a far drizzare le sementi.

translation.en: -[villagers laugh] Yeah! -[chuckles]
So make love tonight.
For the harvest. For the very food we eat.
translation.it: Per il raccolto. Per il cibo che mangiamo.

translation.en: -Yeah! -[villagers] Yeah!
For the gods!
Let's have some music.
Some music to get us in the mood.
Den is a good man.
You should be asleep.
He's the best hunter among us.
And a loyal friend.
Have you thought of a more permanent relationship?
translation.it: Non hai mai pensato a una relazione più duratura?

translation.en: I know that he's amenable to the idea.
He's asked me himself.
It's easy between us.
Does it have to be more than that?
It's just, uh…
That would be your last step to becoming a full member of this community.
translation.it: Così diventeresti un membro effettivo di questa comunità.

translation.en: I'm telling you, this is home now.
translation.it: Questa ormai è la tua casa.

translation.en: I want that to be true.
You know,
the two seasons I've spent here have given me happiness
translation.it: le due stagioni trascorse qui mi hanno donato una felicità

translation.en: that I don't deserve.
But understand, I am a child of war.
translation.it: Ma io sono una figlia della guerra.

translation.en: To truly love and be loved, I…
I don't know if I'm capable of either.
translation.it: Non so se ne sarei capace.

translation.en: The very idea of love, of… family was beaten out of me.
translation.it: L'idea stessa dell'amore e della famiglia mi è stata estirpata con violenza.

translation.en: I was taught that love is weakness.
translation.it: Mi hanno insegnato che l'amore è debolezza.

translation.en: And I…
I don't know how that will ever change.
translation.it: non so come questo potrà mai cambiare.

translation.en: You should get some rest.
Yeah.
[woman] I noticed you left early last night.
translation.it: Sei andata via presto ieri sera.

translation.en: Were you tired?
[Kora] That's right. I thought I'd make it an early night.
translation.it: Già. Ho preferito andare a dormire presto.

translation.en: I thought you were doing your part for the harvest.
translation.it: Non ti sei data da fare per il raccolto?

translation.en: Because as I walked home, I passed Den's house.
translation.it: Tornando a casa sono passata davanti casa di Den

translation.en: -That's what it sounded like. -[Kora laughs]
Sam, I don't know what you're talking about.
translation.it: Sam, non so di cosa stai parlando.

translation.en: [Sam] I think you do.
What do you think they want?
Everything.
I don't care what the potential upside might be,
translation.it: Non mi importa dei possibili vantaggi.

translation.en: a warship hanging over our land cannot be good.
translation.it: Una nave da guerra non promette bene.

translation.en: That's your problem. Your first reaction is always fear.
translation.it: È questo il tuo problema. La tua prima reazione è sempre la paura.

translation.en: The Motherworld has deep pockets.
I'm simply saying maybe we can get a better price
translation.it: Forse possiamo ottenere un prezzo migliore

translation.en: from our friends in low orbit there,
rather than having to deal with the cutthroats in Providence,
translation.it: e non dovremo accordarci con quegli squali di Providence

translation.en: selling our grain to God only knows.
Don't act like we don't know you've been selling our surplus grain
translation.it: Non fingere. So che vendi l'eccedenza

translation.en: to the enemies of that ship up there.
I wonder what they would say if they found out where our excess went last year.
translation.it: Mi chiedo cosa direbbero se scoprissero dov'è finita l'anno scorso.

translation.en: Well, I'm no revolutionary.
They offered the best price. I don't care about their cause.
translation.it: Hanno pagato bene. Non mi importa della loro causa.

translation.en: Obviously.
Sindri, I don't have a side, only this community. That's my only loyalty.
translation.it: Sindri, non parteggio per nessuno. Sono fedele solo a questa comunità.

translation.en: And I say we start by showing them goodwill, not fear.
translation.it: E io suggerisco di dimostrarci ospitali, non spaventati.

translation.en: That we are their partners, not their adversaries, right?
translation.it: Di far vedere che siamo degli alleati e non degli avversari.

translation.en: Did you say "partner," Gunnar?
I did. Is that a problem?
That ship does not represent prosperity.
Its purpose is to destroy, to subjugate, to enslave.
translation.it: Il suo scopo è distruggere, soggiogare e schiavizzare.

translation.en: -Partnership is not in its vocabulary. -[villagers gasp]
Give them what they ask for.
But volunteer nothing about how fertile this land is.
translation.it: ma non menzionate la fertilità di questa terra.

translation.en: And hope they leave before digging too deep into who Gunnar sold last year's grain to.
translation.it: E sperate che non chiedano a chi ha venduto l'eccedenza Gunnar.

translation.en: -Right. -I've heard enough. We volunteer nothing.
translation.it: - Ok. - Basta così. Non diremo loro nulla.

translation.en: Is that clear?
[villager] They're here!
They're coming! They're coming! They're coming!
Hello. I am Sindri, father of this village.
translation.it: Salve. Io sono Sindri, padre di questo villaggio.

translation.en: Welcome.
I'm Admiral Atticus Noble.
Loyal representative of the slain King.
I welcome you to his warm embrace.
Please, father, tell me about this beautiful village.
translation.it: Mi parli del vostro bel villaggio, padre.

translation.en: Walk with me up to our Longhouse.
We can have a cup of ale and I will tell you about life here.
translation.it: Le offrirò della birra e le parlerò della vita qui.

translation.en: Oh. Sounds perfect. Lead the way.
[Sindri] We've carved out a simple life here.
translation.it: Ci siamo ritagliati una vita semplice.

translation.en: And we take pride in the love of our community,
translation.it: Andiamo fieri dell'amore della nostra comunità

translation.en: and the hard work it takes to survive here.
translation.it: e del nostro duro lavoro per sopravvivere.

translation.en: [Noble] Your people seem healthy and well-fed.
translation.it: Sembrate in salute e ben nutriti.

translation.en: As their leader, much of that prosperity must be credited to you.
translation.it: Come loro guida, buona parte del merito sarà sua.

translation.en: No, we are a community. The credit is no one person's.
translation.it: Siamo una comunità. Non è merito di una persona sola.

translation.en: Oh, I know that in the best of times, the credit's shared,
but when the stores are empty, you know where the responsibility falls.
translation.it: ma quando le risorse scarseggiano la responsabilità è di uno solo.

translation.en: The weight of the leader, I suppose.
translation.it: È il fardello di chi comanda, immagino.

translation.en: So you… you understand the feeling of, like, a father,
translation.it: Quindi, in quanto padre, lei saprà cosa comporta l'incombenza

translation.en: the need to feed your children, yes?
translation.it: di dover sfamare i propri figli.

translation.en: I was hoping that your land and the people of Veldt might help
translation.it: La mia speranza è che gli abitanti di Veldt possano aiutarci a trovare alcuni ribelli che si nascondono.

translation.en: as we search for a small band of revolutionaries hiding in this system.
translation.it: possano aiutarci a trovare alcuni ribelli che si nascondono.

translation.en: Who my commander, the Regent Balisarius, bid me find and bring to justice.
translation.it: Il mio superiore, il Reggente Balisarius, li vuole consegnati alla giustizia.

translation.en: We are humble farmers,
far removed from the politics of the Motherworld.
translation.it: estranei alla politica del Mondo Madre.

translation.en: -[ax clatters] -And still you can serve. Hmm.
The rebels we seek have been attacking our supply ports.
translation.it: I ribelli che cerchiamo attaccano i nostri porti di rifornimento.

translation.en: Led by a woman named Devra Bloodaxe, and her brother Darrian.
translation.it: Sono guidati da una certa Devra Bloodaxe e dal fratello Darrian.

translation.en: Their capture's inevitable.
However, it's taken longer than anticipated,
translation.it: Tuttavia ci stiamo mettendo più del previsto

translation.en: and we found ourselves admittedly low on stores.
translation.it: Tuttavia ci stiamo mettendo più del previsto e siamo a corto di provviste.

translation.en: And as you know or may have heard, an army runs on its stomach.
translation.it: Come saprete o avrete sentito, a un esercito serve una pancia piena.

translation.en: I was thinking of a partnership, where you supply us with food.
translation.it: Speravo che voleste collaborare fornendoci del cibo.

translation.en: Whatever you have to spare, of course.
In exchange, you're compensated at…
Let's call it triple the market value, shall we?
translation.it: il triplo del valore di mercato?

translation.en: With that windfall, you'll be able to buy plenty of harvesters, robots,
translation.it: Con una simile somma potrete comprare trebbiatrici, robot

translation.en: and won't have to do this difficult work by hand.
translation.it: e fare a meno del lavoro manuale.

translation.en: We believe that doing the work by hand connects us to the land
translation.it: Noi riteniamo che il lavoro manuale ci leghi alla terra

translation.en: and honors these sacred fields that give us life.
translation.it: onorando i sacri campi che ci danno la vita.

translation.en: [Noble] There's peace of mind knowing that you're invaluable
translation.it: Ma è confortante sapere di avere un ruolo prezioso

translation.en: in the important mission of rooting out enemies of the Motherworld.
translation.it: nella missione di estirpare i nemici del Mondo Madre.

translation.en: -[Sindri] It's quite a proposal. -[Noble] Yes.
[Sindri] If only we had some surplus to offer.
You see, the land is rocky
and yields barely enough to feed ourselves.
translation.it: e il raccolto basta a malapena per sfamarci.

translation.en: So, it is with sincere apologies that we must decline the offer.
translation.it: Con estremo rammarico, dobbiamo declinare l'offerta.

translation.en: However, we are grateful for the presence of such a benevolent and powerful protector.
translation.it: Tuttavia, siamo grati della presenza di un protettore così benevolo e potente.

translation.en: No surplus?
-None at all? -[chuckles]
But your land looks so fertile.
Your fields seem larger than what your population might need.
translation.it: E il raccolto dovrebbe superare le vostre necessità.

translation.en: Of course, I understand how it might seem.
Yet the scale of the planting is evidence of the poor soil.
translation.it: ma le misere coltivazioni dimostrano che il terreno è poco fertile.

translation.en: And our harsh winters only add to the short season.
translation.it: E i duri inverni non aiutano.

translation.en: Now, what do you say we share that cup of ale, eh?
translation.it: Ora che ne dice di bere quella birra?

translation.en: Sorry.
It's just…
I mean, look at these beautiful people.
I can't imagine these glowing complexions are nourished by a barren field.
translation.it: Non sembra malnutrita, con una carnagione così bella.

translation.en: Now… who's the man or woman among you who oversees the harvest?
translation.it: Chi di voi, uomo o donna, sovrintende il raccolto?

translation.en: There must be one whose thumb is greener than the rest.
translation.it: Uno di voi avrà il pollice più verde degli altri.

translation.en: Someone?
[Gunnar] Yes, sir.
-[Noble] Ah. -That is me.
[Noble] Good.
Yes, I oversee the harvest.
Well, if these people trust you, then so do I.
translation.it: Se queste persone si fidano di lei, lo farò anch'io.

translation.en: Trying to understand how I could be so wrong about what this land could yield. That's all.
translation.it: Voglio solo capire come ho potuto sbagliarmi su questa terra.

translation.en: Well, sir.
Sindri, our beloved father, is always looking out for the welfare of our village
translation.it: Sindri, il nostro amato padre, pensa sempre al benessere del villaggio

translation.en: and so insists on keeping reserves in case of famine or drought,
translation.it: e per questo vuole delle scorte in caso di carestia o siccità,

translation.en: which, as you know, is the responsibility of a leader.
translation.it: com'è giusto che faccia un leader.

translation.en: [splutters] But we have been lucky these last few seasons.
translation.it: Ma in queste ultime stagioni siamo stati fortunati,

translation.en: Our surplus has been more than we can store.
translation.it: e le eccedenze hanno superato le scorte.

translation.en: So, there might be
a chance that we can spare a small amount.
Depending, of course, on the scale of your needs.
Mmm. Good. Good.
Yeah, I mean, it's always wise to hold some in reserve, isn't it, father?
translation.it: È sempre saggio avere delle scorte, giusto, padre?

translation.en: Yep. Yep.
I am confused though.
Curious why you should have me believe
translation.it: Perché ha detto che il raccolto basta appena

translation.en: this land could barely yield enough to feed your people.
translation.it: Perché ha detto che il raccolto basta appena a sfamare voi?

translation.en: -Seems that wasn't entirely true. -[Gunnar] No, wait, wait.
translation.it: - Non è del tutto vero. - Un attimo.

translation.en: Admiral, no one is trying to mislead you.
translation.it: Ammiraglio, nessuno vuole trarla in inganno.

translation.en: Sindri simply has a slightly more conservative view on reserves than I do.
translation.it: Sindri ha solo una visione più conservatrice di me sulle scorte.

translation.en: But we're both excited about a possible partnership.
translation.it: Ma saremmo entrambi felici di collaborare.

translation.en: Just bear in mind the reality of what we can supply.
translation.it: Ovviamente potremo fornirvi solo una certa quantità.

translation.en: Father, who is this exactly?
-Uh… My… -[Sindri] He's of no consequence.
translation.it: - Il mio… - Lui non conta nulla.

translation.en: I have been empowered by my people to speak for them.
translation.it: Sono stato designato io come portavoce.

translation.en: This man has no authority here.
translation.it: Lui non ha alcuna autorità, qui.

translation.en: You would be wise to ignore him.
[Noble] Well… a rift.
It's not quite the idyllic community I'd first seen.
translation.it: Non è certo la comunità idilliaca che pensavo.

translation.en: Father, if I may
offer you some advice when dealing with subordinates who need to be kept in place.
translation.it: vorrei darle un consiglio. Dovrebbe tenere a bada i subordinati.

translation.en: I find people can lose sight of the stakes and sometimes need a gentle reminder
translation.it: A volte dimenticano la posta in gioco e gli serve un gentile promemoria

translation.en: of just how those with power deal with those without.
translation.it: per ricordare che non c'è bisogno di loro.

translation.en: [Sindri] Admiral.
Please.
-No, I… I would never… -It's fine.
translation.it: - No, io non… - È tutto ok.

translation.en: -[nervously] I… -Let me show you what I mean.
translation.it: Io… Ora vi mostro cosa intendo.

translation.en: [Sindri] Please.
Admiral.
[Gunnar] No, stop!
[villager] No!
[Gunnar] What did you do?
When can I expect my harvest?
I don't…
I said, tell me, partner, when I can expect my harvest.
translation.it: Ho chiesto quando avrò il mio raccolto, socio.

translation.en: -Nine… nine weeks. -Very well.
In ten weeks, I shall return.
You shall have my 10,000 bushels prepared for my ship.
translation.it: Preparate 10.000 stai per la mia nave.

translation.en: Twelve… We barely produce 12,000 bushels.
We'll starve to death.
I don't understand what you want.
Well, it's simple.
I want everything.
All right, listen up.
I need all of this gear moved to this big stone building.
translation.it: Dovete portare tutto in quell'edificio di pietra.

translation.en: That should suit us for now.
Marcus, you're gonna help me evict the current residents from our new home.
translation.it: Marcus, tu mi aiuterai a sfrattare gli attuali abitanti.

translation.en: Copy?
Copy you, boss.
Copy you.
Hello, everyone.
I am JC-1435 of the Mechanicas Militarium,
translation.it: Io sono JC-1435 del Mechanicas Militarium,

translation.en: defender of the King.
Correction, of the slain King.
It is my honor to serve.
translation.it: È un onore per me servire.

translation.en: I'm Private Aris.
We're moving supplies to that building, if you wouldn't mind lending a hand.
translation.it: Stiamo spostando le provviste in quell'edificio. Puoi aiutarci?

translation.en: Thank you, Private Aris.
That falls perfectly into my protocols.
[Marcus] I'm talking to you, you dirty drain turtle. Come here.
translation.it: Sto parlando con te, lurido topo di fogna. Vieni qui.

translation.en: [shouts] The hell you waiting for? Get out, man!
Thank you.
Now, what in the name of the old gods are you looking at?
translation.it: Cosa guardi, in nome degli antichi dei?

translation.en: I'm sorry, I was just waiting to see if you needed some more water.
translation.it: Chiedo scusa. Aspettavo in caso vi servisse altra acqua.

translation.en: Some more water?
That's how I like 'em. Young, strong enough to put up a fight.
translation.it: È così che mi piacciono. Giovani e abbastanza forti da opporre resistenza.

translation.en: -Boss. -[commander] Hmm?
Look, they left us a Jimmy.
It's a Jimmy, man.
I didn't know we had any of those left.
translation.it: Non sapevo ce ne fossero ancora.

translation.en: All right, careful. The ground's uneven till you get to the bridge.
translation.it: Attento. Il terreno è sconnesso fino al ponte.

translation.en: Thank you, Private Aris, but I believe I can manage.
translation.it: Grazie, soldato Aris, ma dovrei farcela.

translation.en: [Marcus] They won't fight anymore.
What do you mean they won't fight anymore?
It's something in their programming.
Once the King was killed,
they just laid down their weapons and refused to fight.
translation.it: hanno deposto le armi e si sono rifiutati di combattere.

translation.en: Just watch, no matter what I do, he doesn't fight back.
translation.it: Stia a vedere. Qualunque cosa io faccia, non reagirà.

translation.en: [Marcus] Hey! Careful with that stuff, you stupid machine.
translation.it: Ehi! Attento con quella roba, stupida macchina.

translation.en: I'll turn you into scrap, you dumbshit. You hear me?
translation.it: Ti riduco a un rottame, idiota. Hai capito?

translation.en: You're not hearing me.
[Aris] Hey! Stop.
What if I shoot you instead, huh?
I could kill you right now and no one would care.
translation.it: Potrei ucciderti ora e non importerebbe a nessuno.

translation.en: -Would they? -[commander] That's enough.
What do you say? Wanna die?
What's it, huh?
Come on, boy.
I said, enough.
Get these crates into that house now, Private.
translation.it: Porta subito quelle casse nell'edificio, soldato.

translation.en: Yes, boss.
Are you malfunctioning?
No, sir.
Get up. Go to the river. Clean yourself.
translation.it: Alzati e vai al fiume a darti una pulita.

translation.en: The rest of you, stop staring.
Get back to work.
[Marcus] Get back to work, assholes.
[commander] That includes you, Marcus.
[soldier 1] You got it?
[Sam] Excuse me.
[JC-1435] Thank you. That is kind.
-You're a soldier? -Long ago.
translation.it: - Sei un soldato? - Lo ero tanto tempo fa.

translation.en: Do you mind? I'm Sam.
[JC-1435] Please.
Tell me, Sam. Do you know the story of our slain King
translation.it: Dimmi, Sam. Conosci la storia del Re defunto

translation.en: and his beautiful daughter, the Princess Issa?
translation.it: e della sua bellissima figlia, la Principessa Issa?

translation.en: I don't.
Well, you remind me of her.
In myth, she was called the Chalice or the Redeemer.
translation.it: Secondo la leggenda, veniva chiamata il Calice o la Redentrice.

translation.en: She was pueri salvatoris.
translation.it: Era una pueri salvatoris, una salvatrice.

translation.en: And even before she was born,
translation.it: E, ancor prima che lei nascesse,

translation.en: I and my brothers pledged everything we were,
translation.it: io e i miei fratelli votammo noi stessi,

translation.en: everything that dwells inside this metal skin,
translation.it: tutto ciò che è racchiuso in questa pelle metallica,

translation.en: to fight in her name.
So when word reached us on some distant battlefield
translation.it: Quando su un campo di battaglia lontano venimmo a sapere

translation.en: that she, as prophesied, had been born of flesh and blood into our world,
translation.it: che la profezia si era avverata e lei era nata, in carne e ossa,

translation.en: I felt a great warmth for the universe
translation.it: io provai un grande affetto per l'universo

translation.en: and trusted that she was to usher in a new age of peace and compassion.
translation.it: e confidai che lei ci avrebbe condotti a una nuova era di pace ed empatia

translation.en: And bring us home.
She was magic.
[JC-1435] Ah, yes. She was more than magic.
On the day of her coronation,
she, along with our honored King and Queen,
translation.it: lei e i nostri rispettati Re e Regina

translation.en: were assassinated in cold blood by those they trusted most.
translation.it: furono assassinati a sangue freddo da coloro di cui si fidavano di più.

translation.en: I fear we lost some measure of our honor since that betrayal.
translation.it: Da quel tradimento abbiamo perso parte del nostro onore.

translation.en: I'm afraid our compassion, our kindness,
translation.it: E temo che la nostra empatia, la nostra gentilezza

translation.en: our very joy,
died with that young girl.
I think it lives in you.
This is your fault, Gunnar!
I didn't know that he would kill them.
translation.it: Non sapevo che li avrebbe uccisi.

translation.en: Doesn't matter. He's dead now.
[villager 1] What about the soldiers? Next, it's gonna be the other house.
translation.it: Come faremo coi soldati? Occuperanno un altro edificio.

translation.en: -[villager 2] I don't know. -Stop, please.
translation.it: - Non lo so. - Ora basta, per favore.

translation.en: How about we bring in the crop and we fall on their mercy?
translation.it: E se li accontentassimo e così ottenessimo la loro misericordia?

translation.en: [villager 3] Yeah.
We make ourselves invaluable. They wouldn't be able to kill us.
translation.it: - Già. - Ci renderemo indispensabili. Se gli serviremo, non ci uccideranno.

translation.en: -They would need us. -He's right.
translation.it: Se gli serviremo, non ci uccideranno. - Giusto. - Ha ragione.

translation.en: Farming, that is our skill that we can do, that they cannot.
translation.it: Noi siamo bravi agricoltori e loro no.

translation.en: If we show them how good we are, they will be forced to spare us.
translation.it: Se vedranno quanto siamo bravi, ci risparmieranno.

translation.en: -Yes. -Yes. Yeah.
-Do we agree? Our work fights for us. -[all] Yes!
translation.it: - Il nostro lavoro sarà la nostra arma. - Sì! - Sì. - Giusto.

translation.en: -Our work fights for us. Yes? -[villagers] Yes!
[Den] It's settled then.
-We show them how valuable we are. -[villager 3] Okay.
[Den] And when we have fulfilled our side of the deal, they will be forced to rethink how much food they leave us.
translation.it: Una volta fatta la nostra parte, loro rivaluteranno quanto cibo lasciarci.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah.
We can appeal to those gentlemen in the granary, appeal to their humanity.
translation.it: Faremo appello all'umanità di quei gentiluomini.

translation.en: -[villager 3] Yeah. -Good.
So… it's running.
translation.it: E così hai deciso di scappare.

translation.en: Would've thought you'd have had enough of that.
You heard them. They're delusional.
translation.it: Li hai sentiti. Sono degli illusi.

translation.en: They think those soldiers will show mercy even after what they did to Sindri,
translation.it: Credono alla pietà di quei soldati anche se hanno ucciso Sindri

translation.en: right in front of them.
When I found you in the wreckage of that ship,
translation.it: Quando ti trovai tra i rottami di quella nave,

translation.en: I considered leaving you.
I was afraid you could bring trouble to us.
But do I for a moment regret bringing you into our lives?
translation.it: Ma secondo te mi pento di averti portata nelle nostre vite?

translation.en: I do not.
You've become a part of us.
And yet, now you leave when we need you most.
translation.it: Ma quando c'è più bisogno di te, scappi.

translation.en: When your people need you.
translation.it: Quando la tua gente ha bisogno di te.

translation.en: I can't.
You mean, you won't?
This place is already lost. But what if that could change?
translation.it: - Questo posto è spacciato. - E se potessimo cambiare le cose?

translation.en: What if we did fight, not only us, but others?
translation.it: E se lottassimo? Non solo noi, ma anche altri?

translation.en: -Who else would come here and fight? -Others! Others!
translation.it: - Chi verrebbe qui per lottare? - Altri!

translation.en: Others that have reason to hate all that the Motherworld represents.
translation.it: Altri che hanno motivo di odiare ciò che il Mondo Madre rappresenta.

translation.en: Kora, you know this universe better than I.
translation.it: Kora, tu conosci quest'universo meglio di me.

translation.en: What if you could find the warriors that Noble seeks?
translation.it: E se trovassi i guerrieri che l'Ammiraglio Noble sta cercando?

translation.en: The outlaws to fight alongside us?
translation.it: Dei ribelli che combattano al nostro fianco?

translation.en: If I find warriors to fight for Veldt, I give the village hope.
translation.it: Se trovassi dei guerrieri per Veldt, darei speranza al villaggio

translation.en: If I give them hope, they fight and surely lose.
I won't have that blood on my hands.
translation.it: Non voglio avere tutti sulla coscienza.

translation.en: Nor will I throw my life away the same as the rest of you.
translation.it: Né getterò via la mia vita come farete voi.

translation.en: Check this.
Hey, water girl!
-[Marcus] Come here. -[Sam] What is it?
Did you need some more water?
Just a… a little water.
Stop it!
[Marcus] Or what?
-[Marcus yells] -[Sam shouting] Help! Help!
Please, help!
Help!
-Shut up! -Get off me!
-Help me! -[Marcus] Shut up!
[Sam] No. Please!
-[Marcus] Shut up. -Someone help me, please! Please, help!
translation.it: - Zitta. - Qualcuno mi aiuti, per favore!

translation.en: -Help me! Get off of me! -[Marcus] Shut up!
Get off me! [screaming]
[Aris] Don't!
Attaboy. What do you have in mind?
I'm gonna tie you to a post and make you watch every day
translation.it: Ti legherò a un palo e ti mostrerò come, giorno dopo giorno,

translation.en: as she turns from a farm girl to a whore.
translation.it: la trasformeremo da contadina a puttana.

translation.en: Marcus, my good man…
This all sounds nice,
translation.it: La tua è una bella idea,

translation.en: but you're not gonna do anything.
Not until I split this sapling myself.
translation.it: Non prima che me la sia spassata io.

translation.en: Then you may have her.
Then you can all have her.
-[Sam screams] -Get off her!
[Kora] Stop!
Stop.
Dessert. [chuckles maliciously] Perfect.
Definitely get her.
Please.
[commander] I will kill her.
Is that what you want? Huh?
Ah, look who decided to join us.
translation.it: Guardate un po' chi è arrivato.

translation.en: Kill her. Kill them both.
What are you waiting for? I gave you an order.
translation.it: Cosa stai aspettando? Ti ho dato un ordine.

translation.en: Kill this b…
We're gonna have to fight.
[man] Kora, you may need this.
I found it at the site of the crash.
I thought it was lost.
Our culture is not for such weapons.
translation.it: La nostra cultura non ammette certe armi.

translation.en: I feared it could be dangerous.
You were right.
Thank you.
Where will you go?
There is someone, a general named Titus.
translation.it: A cercare qualcuno. Un certo Generale Titus.

translation.en: Once a hero of the Realm
who turned his own forces against those of the Motherworld.
translation.it: si è ribellato al Mondo Madre.

translation.en: Last I heard, he was still out there somewhere.
translation.it: Pare sia ancora là fuori da qualche parte.

translation.en: If I could find him and men for him to lead…
translation.it: Se riuscissi a trovare lui e dei guerrieri…

translation.en: Last year, in Providence, you sold grain to the resistance.
translation.it: L'anno scorso, a Providence, vendesti i cereali ai ribelli.

translation.en: Yes. I met a man there who introduced me to the insurgents.
translation.it: Sì. Conobbi un uomo che mi presentò i ribelli.

translation.en: The Bloodaxes.
-Would he still know how to find them? -It's possible.
Then you'll take me to him?
Of course I will.
[Gunnar] Hey! Bring down one more uraki!
A general and an army?
We might stand a chance.
Be careful.
A safe journey… to the both of you.
[Gunnar] So you were a soldier for the Motherworld?
translation.it: E così eri un soldato del Mondo Madre?

translation.en: Fighting for the Realm?
[Kora] You could say that.
Of high rank, I suppose?
I mean, are you wanted for desertion?
That and more.
Okay.
Anything else you wanna ask me?
[Gunnar] They won't just kill us, will they?
translation.it: Non ci uccideranno e basta, eh?

translation.en: I mean, I understand making an example of Sindri
translation.it: Capisco fare di Sindri un esempio

translation.en: to keep us in line.
But we're just farmers, we're not a threat.
translation.it: ma siamo agricoltori. Non siamo una minaccia.

translation.en: How can you know they will destroy us?
When they first came to my world, I was nine years old.
translation.it: Quando sono arrivati nel mio mondo, avevo nove anni.

translation.en: They never asked for anything.
There were no terms.
[Kora] Only the lust for destruction.
translation.it: Solo la loro sete di distruzione.

translation.en: The Motherworld's forces were commanded by a young general named Balisarius,
translation.it: Le forze del Mondo Madre erano guidate dal giovane Generale Balisarius,

translation.en: who relished the ecstasy of combat.
The people of my world had mounted a brave defense,
translation.it: Il mio popolo si difese con coraggio,

translation.en: but it had served only to enrage the young general
translation.it: ma questo fece solo arrabbiare di più il giovane generale,

translation.en: and gave him provocation to take out that anger on the innocent.
translation.it: spingendolo a sfogare la sua rabbia sugli innocenti.

translation.en: I found myself face-to-face with Balisarius,
translation.it: Mi ritrovai faccia a faccia con Balisarius,

translation.en: who loved commanding his troops,
translation.it: che amava comandare le sue truppe

translation.en: not from the conning tower of his ships,
translation.it: non dalla torre di comando delle astronavi,

translation.en: but on the battlefield itself.
[Kora] Balisarius killed my entire family and took me with him.
translation.it: Balisarius uccise la mia famiglia e mi portò con sé.

translation.en: I don't know why he spared me.
Why, of the hundreds of thousands that died at his hands,
translation.it: Perché, tra tutte le centinaia di migliaia di persone uccise,

translation.en: he chose me to live.
Saw something in me, I suppose.
Someone to share in his pain.
translation.it: Qualcuno con cui condividere il dolore.

translation.en: They gave me the name Arthelais,
began my training and education in the histories of the Motherworld.
translation.it: iniziarono ad addestrarmi e a insegnarmi la storia del Mondo Madre.

translation.en: And for five years, I lived on that ship with its soldiers,
translation.it: Per cinque anni, vissi su quell'astronave coi soldati.

translation.en: who were my only family.
No softness.
Only the hard lessons of war.
translation.it: Solo con le dure lezioni della guerra.

translation.en: He took me often on missions of diplomacy,
translation.it: Lui mi portava con sé nelle sue missioni diplomatiche

translation.en: and I was his child.
translation.it: e io ero la sua bambina.

translation.en: I was his protégé. I was his student.
translation.it: La sua protetta. La sua pupilla.

translation.en: I was one of them.
Daughter of a decorated commander.
translation.it: La figlia di un comandante decorato.

translation.en: Friend to the King and the royal family.
translation.it: Amica del Re e della famiglia reale,

translation.en: -Living a life of privilege. -[muted dialogue]
[Kora] But regardless of my social standing, I was expected to do my duty.
translation.it: Ma, nonostante la mia posizione sociale, dovevo fare il mio dovere.

translation.en: To fight for the Motherworld.
At the Academy Militarium, they encouraged us to find a lover.
translation.it: All'Accademia Militarium, ci incoraggiavano a trovare un compagno.

translation.en: Someone we would defend with our lives
translation.it: Qualcuno da difendere a costo della vita

translation.en: when the politics of expansion became too abstract,
and the why of the conquest was lost in sheer savagery of combat.
translation.it: fossero diventate troppo astratte e oscurate dalla violenza della guerra.

translation.en: Come on! Let's go! Come on!
[Kora] So, at the age of 18, I was made an officer and given a command.
translation.it: A 18 anni, fui nominata ufficiale e mi affidarono delle truppe.

translation.en: [Kora] I fought for the King on distant worlds
translation.it: Lottai in nome del Re in mondi distanti

translation.en: under the banner of a people who murdered my entire family
translation.it: sotto il vessillo del popolo che aveva sterminato la mia famiglia

translation.en: and destroyed my world.
They had trained me,
broken me, and rebuilt me in their image.
translation.it: fatta a pezzi e ricostruita a loro immagine.

translation.en: I'm only telling you this so you know who I am.
translation.it: Te lo sto raccontando per farti capire chi sono.

translation.en: You asked how I know that they'll destroy you.
translation.it: Mi hai chiesto come so che vi stermineranno.

translation.en: That's what I would do.
translation.it: Perché è ciò che farei io.

translation.en: Hawkshaws.
Bounty hunters. They work for the Imperium.
translation.it: Cacciatori di taglie. Lavorano per l'Imperium.

translation.en: Wait.
-[man screams] -[Gunnar] Oh, no.
That's our guy. That's the man we came to see. The one that introduced me to the Bloodaxes.
translation.it: Lui è l'uomo che cerchiamo. Quello che mi ha presentato i Bloodaxe.

translation.en: Did the Bloodaxes give you any other way to contact them?
No. They said they were sheltered on a planet called Sharaan.
translation.it: No. Hanno solo detto di aver trovato rifugio su Sharaan.

translation.en: -Protected by a king named Levitica. -Levitica.
translation.it: - Un pianeta protetto da Re Levitica. - Levitica.

translation.en: Come.
Anyway, I think our best chance to find the Bloodaxes
translation.it: Credo che la migliore chance di trovare i Bloodaxe

translation.en: is to contact the Leviticans.
[Kora] It might expose us.
First we find General Titus, then we'll see about your rebels.
translation.it: Prima troviamo il Generale Titus e poi i ribelli.

translation.en: Is this your owner?
Move on. He's not for sale.
Everything's for sale in this place, so… [inhales sharply] how much?
translation.it: Tutto è in vendita, qui. Quanto vuoi?

translation.en: You know, I have a room upstairs…
translation.it: - Ho una stanza di sopra… - No.

translation.en: …with relatively clean sheets.
That's a very generous offer. But I don't think so…
translation.it: È un'offerta generosa, ma non credo…

translation.en: I guarantee you, by morning,
you're gonna be begging me for more.
translation.it: mi implorerai e vorrai di più.

translation.en: -I said, move on. -[scoffs]
-Come on, Mama. -[tense music plays]
-Whoa, whoa, whoa. -Let him come and play.
You need to leave.
Listen close, you jealous little bitch.
Now you listen close. I told you, you need to leave.
translation.it: Ascoltami bene tu. Ho detto che devi andartene.

translation.en: I'm looking for information.
Has anyone here heard of General Titus or know where he might be?
translation.it: Qualcuno qui ha sentito parlare del Generale Titus o sa dove si trova?

translation.en: Of course, General Titus.
Crazy bastard. Turned his own men on the Motherworld's forces [grunts]
translation.it: Quel pazzo bastardo. Ha consegnato i suoi uomini al Mondo Madre

translation.en: at the Battle of Sarawu.
Do you know of his location?
Last I heard, he was fighting in the coliseum at Pollux.
translation.it: Che io sappia, combatte nel colosseo di Pollux.

translation.en: I'd be careful if I were you, little miss.
translation.it: Fossi in te farei attenzione, signorina.

translation.en: Last hunter who went looking for him ended up with his head on a pike
translation.it: La testa dell'ultimo cacciatore di teste che lo cercava è su una picca

translation.en: outside the coliseum entrance
as a warning not to bother him.
So, he's on Pollux.
-That's your plan? -That's my plan.
translation.it: - È questo il tuo piano? - Sì.

translation.en: What?
Guess we need to find a ship to take us to Pollux.
translation.it: Ci serve un'astronave per andare su Pollux.

translation.en: You're catching on.
Hey! Bitch!
You should have killed me.
Now you're gonna die.
I'm gonna give you one chance to just turn and walk away.
translation.it: Ti darò una sola possibilità di voltarti e andartene.

translation.en: Are you gonna give all of us one chance?
translation.it: Darai una sola possibilità a tutti noi?

translation.en: -Kill her. -[gun powers up]
Impressive.
[Kora] Were those Hawkshaws that paid you working for the Motherworld?
translation.it: Gli Hawkshaw che servi lavorano per il Mondo Madre?

translation.en: -I don't like bounty hunters. -[man] I didn't ask.
translation.it: - Odio i cacciatori di teste. - Non l'ho chiesto.

translation.en: And to be clear, I don't like bounty hunters either.
translation.it: E anch'io odio i cacciatori di teste.

translation.en: [Kora] So you're a gun for hire? No. That's not my thing.
translation.it: - Quindi sei un mercenario? - No, non sarebbe da me.

translation.en: I'm more of an opportunist, you might say.
A real hero, huh?
Wait.
Look. I heard you in there, trying to get to Pollux.
translation.it: Sentite, prima vi ho sentito dire che siete diretti su Pollux.

translation.en: I could help you.
Oh, understand, we're just simple farmers.
We're searching for soldiers for a fight against the Motherworld.
translation.it: Cerchiamo dei soldati per contrastare il Mondo Madre.

translation.en: We have some money, but this is not the one you get rich on.
translation.it: Abbiamo un po' di soldi, ma non tanti da arricchirsi.

translation.en: Aye, I understand.
Still, pay me what it's worth to you.
Soldiers for a fight against the Motherworld?
translation.it: Un esercito contro il Mondo Madre?

translation.en: Well, my name's Kai.
Come on, my ship's down at port.
translation.it: Andiamo. La mia astronave è al porto.

translation.en: Right. Setting course for Pollux.
translation.it: Ok. Imposto la rotta per Pollux.

translation.en: [Kai] I need to stop on Neu-Wodi first.
You know, there's a rancher there.
He has a man that might just work out for you.
Is he worth our time?
Because we can't afford to waste any.
I think you'll like him.
You ever been off-planet? No.
translation.it: - Hai mai lasciato il pianeta? - No.

translation.en: What did you do on the farm?
I oversee the harvest, and planting, cataloguing seeds, and making sure that…
translation.it: Sovrintendevo il raccolto, la semina, catalogavo i semi e mi assicuravo…

translation.en: That sounds great. You might want to hold on.
Come in.
Oh, Cassius, it's you. Good.
[Cassius] We received a communiqué from the Hawkshaws.
They're requesting to rendezvous with us.
Apparently they've captured a creature
that has important information about the insurgents,
translation.it: che ha importanti informazioni sui ribelli:

translation.en: Devra Bloodaxe and her brother.
Bloodaxe? Huh.
-Well, that… -[creatures chitter]
That's excellent, Cassius.
Inform me when they arrive.
-[Cassius] Yes, sir. -Hey.
Well, if it isn't the bastard from Saaldorun.
translation.it: Guarda chi si vede. Quel bastardo di Saaldorun.

translation.en: -What brings you all the way out here? -I missed your smiling face.
translation.it: - Cosa ti porta fin qui? - Mi mancava il tuo sorriso.

translation.en: You still got that man chained in the back?
translation.it: Hai ancora quel tizio in catene?

translation.en: Tarak? Yeah, he's working off his debt to me.
translation.it: Tarak? Sì. Sta saldando il suo debito.

translation.en: Another couple dozen seasons, we should be square.
translation.it: Un altro paio di dozzine di stagioni e saremo pari.

translation.en: What's it to you?
You mind if we talk to him?
Could be a deal in it for ya.
Well, if there's money to be made…
translation.it: Beh, se c'è da guadagnare dei soldi…

translation.en: Hey!
Hey! Tarak!
[man] These people want to talk to you.
-What got that chain on your leg? -[Tarak] A long road of mistakes.
translation.it: - Come mai sei incatenato qui? - Troppi errori.

translation.en: But if you're here to accuse me of crimes against the Motherworld,
translation.it: Se volete accusarmi di crimini contro il Mondo Madre,

translation.en: I'm guilty as charged. Take it up with him.
No. That's not why we're here.
translation.it: No. Non siamo qui per questo.

translation.en: We're here from a small village, and we're looking to hire some fighters
translation.it: Veniamo da un piccolo villaggio e cerchiamo dei guerrieri

translation.en: to train and protect us against a force from the Motherworld.
translation.it: che ci addestrino e ci proteggano dal Mondo Madre.

translation.en: -I'm no friend of the Realm. -Okay.
translation.it: - Non sono amico del Regno. - Ok.

translation.en: [Tarak] That's well-known.
And I'd gladly fight with you,
but… I have a debt on my name, and I honor my debts.
translation.it: ma devo saldare un debito, e io onoro sempre i debiti.

translation.en: What's he owe you?
300,000 Darams ought to cover any inconvenience I've suffered.
translation.it: Trecentomila daram coprirebbero gli inconvenienti che mi ha causato.

translation.en: Oh, ya bollocks.
We don't have that kind of money. No money.
translation.it: - Non abbiamo così tanti soldi. - Niente soldi…

translation.en: Well, I do love to gamble.
Here we go.
What's the bet?
If Tarak can break that creature out there, his debts are squared with me.
translation.it: Se Tarak domerà la creatura là fuori avrà saldato il debito.

translation.en: [man] But if he don't ride him,
you all get a chain and a shackle.
That's the deal.
[man] Grab it tighter!
Watch its tail!
Can you ride him?
Yeah… I can ride him.
[man] Yank it hard! Don't let him fight you like that!
translation.it: Dai uno strattone! Non farti sopraffare!

translation.en: Drop your leads.
She'll tear you apart.
Drop your leads and clear out now.
translation.it: Lasciate le funi e allontanatevi subito.

translation.en: Suit yourself. Drop them.
[in Samandrait] I'm not going to hurt you.
You're far from home and so am I.
translation.it: Anche tu, come me, sei lontana da casa.

translation.en: See, you and I…
…we are alike.
We've been hurt. Betrayed. Our trust has been broken.
translation.it: Siamo stati feriti e traditi, e non ci fidiamo più di nessuno.

translation.en: We both know fear.
Yet, the biggest fear we both face…
translation.it: Ma la nostra più grande paura…

translation.en: …is the fear of ourselves.
[in English] That's it.
[in Samandrait] Let's show them we're not afraid.
Let's show them we're more than the shackles that bind us.
translation.it: Dimostriamogli che valiamo più delle catene che ci legano.

translation.en: [in English] Easy. Easy. Easy. Let's go. Let's go.
There.
Yeah.
It's okay.
Hickman, I've done as you asked.
translation.it: Hickman, ho fatto quello che mi hai chiesto.

translation.en: Your debt is square with me.
Be good to her.
[men] Go! Get out!
-[Hickman] Hey! -[bennu screeches]
Hey.
No. No.
Attagirl.
[Gunnar] Tarak! Let's go.
This was good. Anyone else you know of along the way?
translation.it: Lui ci sarà utile. Conosci altri lungo la strada?

translation.en: I might have a couple ideas.
[woman] So, what's the job?
We represent a village on a small moon called Veldt.
translation.it: Rappresentiamo un villaggio su una piccola luna chiamata Veldt.

translation.en: This village faces the threat of annihilation by the armies of the Motherworld.
translation.it: Il villaggio rischia di essere distrutto dagli eserciti del Mondo Madre.

translation.en: We are looking for warriors
to join the fight to protect them.
With your reputation,
we thought it might be something you'd be interested in.
-Nemesis, please, please. -Hold her.
Help her. Please, please.
[Harmada] Stay back.
I just want to talk. That's all.
I'm clearly distressed, that's true.
But I'm not stupid.
I know why you're here. You want the child.
translation.it: So perché sei qui. Vuoi la bambina.

translation.en: Yes, I do. [Harmada] You can't have this one.
This one is mine.
She has a mother who's waiting for her.
Who's missing her.
And why should I care about that mother's pain when no one is here for my pain?
translation.it: Perché dovrei preoccuparmi del suo dolore quando nessuno ha a cuore il mio?

translation.en: -[child whimpers] -This was my home before they came.
translation.it: Io vivevo qui da molto prima che arrivassero loro.

translation.en: Taste the air.
It's poisoned my body.
It weakens my eggs, and now, my children cannot emerge.
translation.it: Indebolisce le mie uova e impedisce ai miei figli di nascere.

translation.en: I deserve justice.
[Nemesis] I understand.
But this is not the way.
translation.it: Ma non è questo il modo.

translation.en: There is a difference between justice and revenge.
translation.it: C'è differenza tra giustizia e vendetta.

translation.en: Is there?
I'm not so sure.
I know a mother's pain.
translation.it: Conosco il dolore di una madre.

translation.en: I know the loneliness of that pain.
But you can't hurt that child.
translation.it: Ma non le farai del male.

translation.en: I won't let you.
I believe you. But understand.
-I will kill this child. -[child sobs]
And I will keep killing until every mother weeps tears of regret
translation.it: e continuerò a uccidere finché ogni madre non verserà lacrime di rimpianto

translation.en: for ever having come to the mines of Daggus.
translation.it: per essere venuta nelle miniere di Daggus.

translation.en: Shit!
Come on.
Let's go.
Come. Back up! Back up!
-[child whimpers] -Come here.
Wow. That was…
That was amazing.
Do not celebrate this.
There's no honor in this.
This could easily be any of you lying here
translation.it: A chiunque di voi poteva capitare di ritrovarsi

translation.en: in the gutter of some forgotten world,
translation.it: nei bassifondi di un mondo dimenticato

translation.en: in the name of revenge.
You would do well to remember that.
That was good of you earlier. With the child.
translation.it: Sei stato gentile, prima. Con la bambina.

translation.en: -I was just trying to help. -Yes, but it's not natural for some.
translation.it: - Volevo solo aiutare. - Sì, ma ad alcuni non viene naturale.

translation.en: [Gunnar] It is for you.
Back home, you saved Sam without hesitation.
translation.it: Sul nostro pianeta hai salvato Sam senza esitazione.

translation.en: Kindness is a virtue worth dying for.
translation.it: Vale la pena morire in nome della gentilezza.

translation.en: I believe that.
I didn't always.
I told you how I fought on countless worlds.
translation.it: Ti ho detto del mio passato di soldato.

translation.en: Well, word of my victories reached my adopted father.
translation.it: La notizia delle mie vittorie giunse a mio padre adottivo

translation.en: And the King.
[Kora] For my loyalty and service, I was promoted to the Elite Guard of the Royal Family.
translation.it: Lealtà e servigi mi valsero la promozione a Guardia d'élite della famiglia reale.

translation.en: The appointment was engineered by my father.
translation.it: La promozione fu architettata da mio padre.

translation.en: I couldn't have known it was something more.
translation.it: Non avevo previsto le sue implicazioni.

translation.en: I was given the honor
of being the bodyguard to Princess Issa.
translation.it: la guardia del corpo della Principessa Issa.

translation.en: The princess was named after an ancient Queen Issa,
translation.it: Lei portava il nome dell'antica Regina Issa,

translation.en: the Lifegiver.
In the old stories of the queen,
it was said that she had the power to give life.
translation.it: narravano che fosse in grado di dare la vita.

translation.en: It seemed a myth or a metaphor
translation.it: Sembrava una leggenda o una metafora

translation.en: created in response to the generations of war and conquest.
translation.it: creata in risposta alle generazioni di guerra e conquiste.

translation.en: Yet, the story still captured the imagination of the people.
translation.it: Eppure, la gente ne era affascinata.

translation.en: And it was believed that the princess, my princess, might have that same power.
translation.it: E si credeva che anche la mia Principessa avesse lo stesso potere.

translation.en: I saw on more than one occasion things that I… couldn't explain.
translation.it: In più occasioni vidi cose che non riuscivo a spiegare.

translation.en: Things that made me think that she was different.
translation.it: Cose che mi spinsero a pensare che lei fosse diversa.

translation.en: Special.
The King once said to me…
translation.it: Il Re una volta mi disse…

translation.en: When she becomes queen,
I believe she'll bring a compassion that I've lost
translation.it: diffonderà la compassione che io ho perso

translation.en: after all these hard years of war.
translation.it: dopo tutti questi anni di guerre.

translation.en: [Kora] "It will be the dawn of something better."
-I think your friendship makes her safer. -That our friendship made her safer.
translation.it: Disse che la nostra amicizia la proteggeva.

translation.en: I believed in her.
In her kindness.
I believed in her ability to save us.
The great General Titus.
Thank you.
[Gunnar] Okay.
Are you sure this is a good idea?
translation.it: Sicura che sia una buona idea?

translation.en: Let's clean him up and get him sober.
-Yeah, that'll do it. -[Tarak] Come on.
-[Gunnar] Come on. -[Kai] You got him.
-[Tarak] Come on. -Get off me! [yells]
What do you think you're doing?
That's enough. Thank you.
Did you command the Eastern ranks for the Old King?
translation.it: Lei comandava i ranghi orientali del vecchio Re?

translation.en: Are you not General Titus? A legend.
translation.it: Non è il Generale Titus, la leggenda?

translation.en: I don't know what you're running your mouth about.
Why can't you just leave me alone?
translation.it: Perché non mi lasciate in pace?

translation.en: Because my best hope is that long-ago general is still in front of me.
translation.it: Perché la mia unica speranza è che quel generale sia qui davanti a me.

translation.en: What do you want from me?
My men are dead because of my surrender.
translation.it: I miei uomini sono morti perché mi sono arreso.

translation.en: I'm tired of reliving that nightmare every day.
translation.it: Sono stufo di rivivere quell'incubo ogni giorno.

translation.en: Now, please, leave me and let me die in peace.
translation.it: Ora sparisci e lasciami morire in pace.

translation.en: I don't think you're meant to die here…
translation.it: Non credo sia destinato a morire qui,

translation.en: General.
Stop calling me that. I have no rank, no privilege.
translation.it: Non chiamarmi così. Non ho rango o privilegi.

translation.en: I'm here to make you an offer. To give you a chance at redemption.
translation.it: Sono qui per farle una proposta. Per darle modo di redimersi.

translation.en: -I am beyond redemption. -I have no time for pity!
translation.it: - Non c'è redenzione per me. - Non ho tempo per l'autocommiserazione!

translation.en: What about all the dead men you once commanded?
translation.it: Cosa mi dice degli uomini che comandava?

translation.en: What about them?
If not redemption,
what about revenge?
This is the man who knows where the insurgents are?
translation.it: È lui che sa dove sono i ribelli?

translation.en: It is, sir.
Well, I'm listening.
You'll let me go if I tell you what I know?
I'll set you free, you have my word.
translation.it: Ti libererò. Hai la mia parola.

translation.en: I haven't seen Devra Bloodaxe for a full season,
translation.it: Non vedo Devra Bloodaxe da un'intera stagione,

translation.en: but at the time they were on Sharaan, under the protection of a king called…
translation.it: ma all'epoca si trovavano su Sharaan, protetti da un tale re…

translation.en: [Noble] Go on.
This was some time ago, but they were definitely there.
translation.it: È passato del tempo, ma vivevano lì.

translation.en: Talk to him, to Levitica.
I certainly will. Thank you.
Thought we had a deal! Yes, we did.
You're free.
[Noble] Dissect his brain and see if we can find out any more information.
translation.it: Sezionategli il cervello in cerca di altre informazioni.

translation.en: Then we'll go pay our respects to King Levitica.
translation.it: Dopodiché andremo a trovare Re Levitica.

translation.en: [Cassius] Yes, Admiral. I'll set a course for Sharaan.
translation.it: D'accordo. Imposto la rotta per Sharaan.

translation.en: Let's go.
[in Sharaanese] Your patience is appreciated and I can assure you…
translation.it: Apprezziamo la vostra pazienza, e vi assicuro

translation.en: …Devra is aware of your presence.
translation.it: che Devra è stata informata della vostra presenza.

translation.en: A decision when to receive you is imminent.
Thank you, Levitica, honored king.
We await their arrival.
-[distant boom] -[Gunnar in English] Look.
Farmer, why would you contact us from this unknown and flagless vessel?
translation.it: Contadino, perché ci hai contattati da questo vascello senza bandiera?

translation.en: I was assuming we had a level of trust after our last meeting.
translation.it: Credevo ci fosse fiducia tra noi dopo l'ultimo incontro.

translation.en: We bought your grain to feed our fighters.
translation.it: Abbiamo comprato i tuoi cereali per sfamare i soldati.

translation.en: Do not confuse your business of commerce with our business of revolution.
translation.it: Non confondere il tuo commercio con la nostra rivoluzione.

translation.en: [Gunnar] I understand.
Your coming here is a great risk to us all and to our benefactor.
translation.it: Venendo qui avete messo in pericolo noi e il nostro benefattore.

translation.en: But we are no longer in need of your grain.
translation.it: Non abbiamo più bisogno dei vostri cereali.

translation.en: King Levitica's kindness has been more than enough to sustain us,
translation.it: La gentilezza di Re Levitica ci ha sostenuto a sufficienza

translation.en: so I suggest you leave immediately.
translation.it: quindi vi suggerisco di andarvene subito.

translation.en: [Kora] We're not here to sell grain.
translation.it: Non siamo qui per i cereali.

translation.en: Gunnar's village was visited by a Dreadnought that threatens its very existence.
translation.it: Una Dreadnought al villaggio di Gunnar ne minaccia l'esistenza.

translation.en: I have recruited these warriors and given my word to bring them back and defend the farmers.
translation.it: Ho reclutato questi guerrieri per tornare e difendere quegli agricoltori.

translation.en: -But we're running out of time. -What?
translation.it: - Ma ci resta poco tempo. - Cosa?

translation.en: This handful? Against a Dreadnought?
translation.it: Una manciata di guerrieri contro una Dreadnought?

translation.en: That's why we have come. You have men and ships.
translation.it: Siamo qui per questo. Voi avete uomini e navi.

translation.en: With you we could mount a real defense.
translation.it: Con voi avremmo una vera difesa.

translation.en: And, of course, we can pay you with the surplus from our harvest.
translation.it: E ovviamente vi pagheremmo con le eccedenze del raccolto.

translation.en: It's all we've got.
[Devra] My forces against the King's Gaze? That's suicide.
translation.it: Il mio esercito contro l'Occhio del Re? Sarebbe un suicidio.

translation.en: That ship cannot be destroyed by a few dozen fighters.
translation.it: Non basta qualche soldato per distruggerla.

translation.en: That ship and the men aboard it are world destroyers.
translation.it: Quella nave e gli uomini a bordo distruggono mondi.

translation.en: I'm sorry, it's impossible.
[Kora] This man is not a revolutionary.
He's a simple farmer.
But commerce or not,
his people toiled with their bare hands to grow the grain that fed you. All of you!
translation.it: la sua gente ha sgobbato per coltivare i cereali che hanno sfamato tutti voi!

translation.en: And because of that transaction,
their village is now threatened by Admiral Noble,
translation.it: il villaggio è minacciato dall'Ammiraglio Noble

translation.en: in pursuit of your revolution.
I see.
I will go.
Thank you.
Brother, a word.
Our victories, what few there have been, have been tactical ones.
translation.it: Le nostre vittorie, anche se poche, sono state tattiche.

translation.en: We cannot fight in the open against the King's Gaze.
translation.it: Non possiamo attaccare l'Occhio del Re.

translation.en: If the farmer found us, it won't be long before Noble does.
translation.it: Se il contadino ci ha trovati, presto ci troverà anche Noble.

translation.en: And I will not allow another world to fall in our name.
translation.it: E io non permetterò che un altro mondo cada per colpa nostra.

translation.en: And what of those you command?
[Darrian] Their lives are theirs.
These people, they've come to us with
translation.it: Queste persone si sono rivolte a noi

translation.en: nowhere else to turn.
They come… …seeking our help…
…to stand against a Dreadnought of the Motherworld.
translation.it: per affrontare una Dreadnought del Mondo Madre.

translation.en: Is that not what we stand for?
translation.it: Non è questo il nostro scopo?

translation.en: Are they not who we once were?
translation.it: Loro non sono forse come eravamo noi un tempo?

translation.en: If we will not stand with these defiant farmers to protect their home,
translation.it: Se non li affiancheremo aiutandoli a proteggere il loro mondo,

translation.en: then the revolution is meaningless.
translation.it: la rivoluzione non ha alcun senso.

translation.en: Under free will,
who among you is willing to die for what we believe
translation.it: chi di voi è disposto a morire per i propri ideali

translation.en: rather than hide behind it?
[Darrian] Milius.
Why am I not surprised?
Who is going to make sure you'll return in one piece, if not me?
translation.it: Chi si assicurerà che torni tutto intero se non io?

translation.en: Thank Levitica and leave this planet.
translation.it: Ringrazia Levitica e lasciate questo pianeta.

translation.en: Sister, until we meet again.
Maybe this isn't suicide after all.
Why would he agree to help you?
Bloodaxe? You think they shouldn't?
translation.it: Bloodaxe? Credi che non avrebbe dovuto?

translation.en: It just seems short-sighted.
I mean, he weakens what little of
whatever word you wanna use for it there is…
Resistance, insurgency.
For what, Kora?
The chance to get obliterated by a Dreadnought?
Guilt, it's a powerful thing.
translation.it: Il senso di colpa è una cosa potente.

translation.en: [Kai] Aye, guilt. The underbelly of honor.
translation.it: Giusto. Il senso di colpa. Il punto debole dell'onore.

translation.en: I think I might've had that once.
Honor.
Would you believe that?
It's true.
I mean, what do you figure?
I got ten, fifteen more seasons at most, before I steal from the wrong man.
translation.it: Mi restano al massimo 10 o 15 stagioni prima che rubi all'uomo sbagliato.

translation.en: Get stabbed to death by some dog-headed son of a bitch in a bar fight.
translation.it: O venga accoltellato a morte da uno stupido bastardo in una rissa.

translation.en: It's really your fault, anyway.
Makin' me wanna be an honorable man.
translation.it: Cerchi di rendermi un uomo rispettabile.

translation.en: If you had more resisting power to speak of, you wouldn't need me to join you so badly.
translation.it: Se avessi una maggiore resistenza, non avresti così bisogno di me.

translation.en: You're willing to fight with us?
Since you're beggin'.
Kai, we're not.
Well, since you're asking, then.
If you'll allow me.
There is one complication.
The shite in the cargo hold.
I got buyers waiting in Gondival. Aren't the kinds known for their patience.
translation.it: Gli acquirenti sono su Gondival. E non sono noti per la loro pazienza.

translation.en: Might be wise to sever my ties to life as a thief
translation.it: Vorrei lasciarmi alle spalle la vita da ladro

translation.en: before we go picking a fight with a Dreadnought.
Besides, you said yourself you need me.
translation.it: E poi hai detto tu che hai bisogno di me.

translation.en: -I did not say that. -I think you did.
translation.it: - Non l'ho mai detto. - Secondo me, sì.

translation.en: I'll set the course and let 'em know we're on our way. Oh, shit, does that make me one of the good guys?
translation.it: Imposto la rotta e avverto che arriviamo. Oh, cazzo, questo fa di me uno dei buoni?

translation.en: [in Sharaanese] I beg you…
[in English] Please!
I've told you the truth.
I have nothing more.
[Noble] Right. [scoffs] The truth…
…that you took them in, known enemies of the Motherworld,
translation.it: è che ha accolto dei noti nemici del Mondo Madre,

translation.en: mended their wounds, repaired their broken ships,
translation.it: li ha medicati e ha riparato le loro astronavi

translation.en: all out of your moral code of honor and charity.
translation.it: in nome del suo senso dell'onore e della carità.

translation.en: Our civilization has lived and thrived for 10,000 years
translation.it: La nostra civiltà vive e prospera da 10.000 anni

translation.en: with honor and charity as its most valued tenets.
translation.it: con onore e carità come principi fondamentali.

translation.en: Yes. Yes, honor and charity.
Do you see that?
That ship is named the King's Gaze.
translation.it: È l'astronave chiamata Occhio del Re.

translation.en: It was named to honor our slain father.
translation.it: Nome scelto in onore del Padre defunto.

translation.en: So…
honor I understand.
Charity, I do not.
Our King showed charity to an off-worlder like yourself
translation.it: Il nostro Re è stato caritatevole con uno straniero come lei

translation.en: and was slaughtered for his charity.
translation.it: ed è stato ucciso per questo.

translation.en: So, we named the ship to remind us of the power in that benevolent gaze
translation.it: Il nome della nave serve a ricordarci che il potere del suo occhio benevolo

translation.en: that was lost to charity.
translation.it: è andato perduto per colpa della carità.

translation.en: And to remember that, if by God's will, that gaze should fall upon us and be held,
translation.it: E per ricordarci che se, Dio volendo, l'Occhio dovesse soffermarsi su di noi

translation.en: for even the briefest of moments,
it could change your life forever.
translation.it: la nostra vita potrebbe cambiare per sempre.

translation.en: Today, it falls upon you.
translation.it: Oggi si è fermato su di lei.

translation.en: We are cleared to engage.
-[systems beep] -Confirmed.
[commander] Fire at will.
[Cassius] Sir, we received a message from one of our Hawkshaws.
translation.it: Signore, abbiamo ricevuto un messaggio da un Hawkshaw.

translation.en: They're closing in on the Bloodaxes.
Finally, some good news.
Well, prepare the hyperlaunch.
I'll go ahead and personally retrieve the treasonous dogs myself.
And what orders for the King's Gaze, sir?
translation.it: Quali ordini per l'Occhio del Re?

translation.en: Well, once you've razed the planet,
translation.it: Una volta raso al suolo il pianeta, ci ritroveremo,

translation.en: we'll rendezvous, extract the exact location of the rest of the insurgents,
translation.it: Una volta raso al suolo il pianeta, ci ritroveremo, scopriremo dove sono gli altri ribelli e li distruggeremo una volta per tutte.

translation.en: and destroy them once and for all.
translation.it: scopriremo dove sono gli altri ribelli e li distruggeremo una volta per tutte.

translation.en: [Cassius] Yes, sir.
[Gunnar] I'm pretty sure Kai said these boxes.
-[Titus] We've got one. -[Gunnar] Okay.
Aye, just take the gray ones.
-They're all marked. -All right.
For God's sake, don't look inside. I'd hate you to think less of me.
translation.it: Non guardate dentro. Non vorrei che pensaste male di me.

translation.en: Where do you want them?
-There's space behind the bridge. -Done.
translation.it: - C'è un spazio dietro il ponte. - Ok.

translation.en: All right, put them the other side of the bridge.
translation.it: Portatele al di là del ponte.

translation.en: Aye, let's unload and get off this godforsaken rock.
translation.it: Scarichiamo e lasciamo questa roccia sperduta.

translation.en: I'll be happy to leave this life behind.
translation.it: Sarò felice di lasciare questa vita.

translation.en: Good.
[Hawkshaw] Just wanna make sure that one's on the manifest.
translation.it: Mi accerto che sia sulla bolla.

translation.en: [Darrian] Pilots!
Once you tie off those ships, see if you can get some fuel.
translation.it: Una volta attraccate le navi, procuratevi del carburante.

translation.en: And you two, keep eyes from above!
How we lookin'?
Everything is done.
-[Kai] All right, let's move. -[Hawkshaw] Yes.
-[comms beeps] -On your mark.
This isn't right.
On your knees.
Now is not the time to be a hero.
translation.it: Non è il momento di fare l'eroe.

translation.en: When?
[Kai] On Veldt, in Providence, the first time I heard your story.
translation.it: Su Veldt, a Providence, quando ho sentito la tua storia.

translation.en: Thought with your ideals of resistance I could round up a couple of heads.
translation.it: Ho pensato che con le tue idee ribelli avrei radunato qualche testa.

translation.en: Tarak for instance. His world enslaved.
translation.it: Come Tarak. Il suo mondo è ridotto in schiavitù.

translation.en: Then there was Nemesis.
Her whole family slaughtered.
But General Titus?
Have you any idea how much he alone is worth?
translation.it: Hai idea di quanto valga lui da solo?

translation.en: They would've all jumped at the chance to exact any small vengeance against the Realm.
translation.it: Avrebbero accolto subito la proposta di vendicarsi del Regno,

translation.en: Even if the payment was only a sack of grain.
translation.it: anche se pagati con un sacco di cereali.

translation.en: Then there was you. Kora.
Or should I call you Arthelais?
The biggest prize of them all.
Do you know what the Motherworld did to my planet?
translation.it: Sai cos'ha fatto il Mondo Madre al mio pianeta?

translation.en: They didn't just destroy it.
translation.it: Non si è limitato a distruggerlo.

translation.en: They tortured every man, woman, and child.
translation.it: Ha torturato ogni uomo, donna e bambino.

translation.en: Left them clingin' to life as they turned them to ash from low orbit.
translation.it: Li ha lasciati in fin di vita e poi ridotti in cenere dall'orbita bassa.

translation.en: You know what that taught me?
translation.it: Sai cosa mi ha insegnato questo?

translation.en: Never set foot on the wrong side of history.
translation.it: A non finire mai dal lato sbagliato della storia.

translation.en: [Kora] Is that what you think we're doing?
[Kai] No.
You've chosen the side that doesn't even make it to the history books.
translation.it: Il vostro lato non finirebbe neanche nei libri di storia.

translation.en: What happened to honor?
What did happen to it?
Piece of shit.
Well, who all have we got here?
Who indeed?
Commander Bloodaxe.
Leader of the very insurgency
the King's Gaze was sent to this backwater of the galaxy to capture.
translation.it: che siamo venuti a catturare fin qui con l'Occhio del Re.

translation.en: He alone will secure my seat in the Senate.
translation.it: Lui da solo mi assicurerà un posto in Senato.

translation.en: I would be remiss if I failed to mention we are in the presence of royalty.
translation.it: Sarei negligente se non dicessi che siamo in presenza di un principe.

translation.en: Or should I say Prince Tarak? [scoffs]
General Titus.
Needs no introduction, does he?
His actions at the Battle of Sarawu precede him.
translation.it: Le sue gesta nella Battaglia di Sarawu lo precedono.

translation.en: The farmer.
The ambitious farmer.
I pride myself on never being surprised. And yet, here I am.
translation.it: Mi vanto di non stupirmi mai, eppure devo contraddirmi.

translation.en: I understand why all of them are here… but you.
translation.it: Capisco la loro presenza qui, ma tu…

translation.en: What could you have possibly hoped to gain by mounting such a… feeble stand?
translation.it: Cosa potevi sperare di ottenere organizzando una resistenza così fievole?

translation.en: Tell me.
Oh, yes.
The legendary swordswoman known only by the name of Nemesis.
translation.it: La leggendaria spadaccina nota solo col nome di Nemesis.

translation.en: Assassinated 16 high-ranking Imperial officers
translation.it: Che ha ucciso 16 ufficiali imperiali di alto grado

translation.en: and their security details.
translation.it: e i loro addetti alla sicurezza.

translation.en: All in a hunt to avenge her slaughtered children.
translation.it: Tutto per vendicare il massacro dei suoi figli.

translation.en: [Noble] Of course.
Now I thought I recognized something in you, down in that filthy village.
translation.it: Avevo notato qualcosa in te, in quel lurido villaggio.

translation.en: Out there, amongst all those simple people,
the most wanted fugitive in the known universe.
translation.it: la fuggitiva più ricercata dell'universo noto.

translation.en: Scargiver. Arthelais.
Do you know what you've done for me, Arthelais, truly?
translation.it: Sai cos'hai fatto per me, Arthelais,

translation.en: Assembling yourself as such?
When I lay your bodies at the foot of the Regent,
translation.it: Consegnando i vostri corpi al Reggente,

translation.en: I'll be a hero of the Realm.
They'll write songs of my feats of courage.
It's not like I didn't do all the work.
translation.it: Anche se ho fatto tutto io.

translation.en: Let's move this along, shall we?
Let's transport them paralyzed, in case anyone's feeling frisky.
translation.it: Trasportiamoli da paralizzati per evitare eventuali reazioni.

translation.en: On your feet. I've got a job for you.
translation.it: In piedi. Ho un compito per te.

translation.en: Look… [grunts] Okay, okay.
You play your cards right, you at least might make it out of this alive.
translation.it: Se giocherai bene le tue carte, potresti uscirne vivo.

translation.en: You're sick.
And you're a coward.
[Kai] All you have to do is pull the trigger.
[Gunnar] I won't do it. [Kai] Yes, you will.
You can do it. Just pull the trigger.
-I know you're in love with her. -[Gunnar sighs]
[Kora whimpers] Gunnar.
I'm so sorry.
You can do it.
Pilots! To your ships!
[pilot] Cut me loose! We gotta go!
[screaming] No!
This is perfect.
They gave their lives for us.
They believed in their cause.
What better thing to die for?
And I should have died with them.
translation.it: E io dovevo morire con loro.

translation.en: I know a thing or two about
translation.it: Conosco bene il senso di colpa

translation.en: the guilt of carrying on when those you've sworn to fight with are gone.
translation.it: che ci si porta dietro quando si perdono i propri compagni di battaglia.

translation.en: Honor them.
With everything that you can from now.
Carry them.
This was a blow to the Motherworld, what we did this day.
translation.it: Ciò che abbiamo fatto oggi è un duro colpo per il Mondo Madre.

translation.en: Criminals, nobodies, standing against a machine of war.
translation.it: Criminali, nullità, che affrontano una macchina da guerra.

translation.en: This small act of defiance gives voice to the voiceless.
translation.it: Questo piccolo atto di sfida dà voce ai senza voce.

translation.en: This is more than just a fallen prick officer and some of his men.
translation.it: Non è solo la fine di un ufficiale stronzo e di alcuni suoi uomini.

translation.en: It's the beginning of something.
What will they do now?
The crews of the Imperium are not known for their bravery.
translation.it: Gli equipaggi dell'Imperium non sono noti per il coraggio.

translation.en: After the death of an admiral, protocol will demand the ship's return.
translation.it: Dopo la morte di un ammiraglio, la nave deve rientrare.

translation.en: That's good.
We still get paid, I presume?
[Kora] A deal is a deal.
Payment awaits us on Veldt.
translation.it: La paga ci aspetta su Veldt.

translation.en: I owe you thanks, Gunnar. You know, I never did trust that pilot.
translation.it: Devo ringraziarti, Gunnar. Non mi è mai piaciuto quel pilota.

translation.en: [Kora] We all owe him thanks.
He saved us.
[Titus] I've been wondering. Is what that dead bounty hunter said true?
translation.it: Mi chiedevo una cosa: è vero ciò che ha detto il cacciatore di teste?

translation.en: That you're Arthelais?
Kai was a liar and a thief who nearly sold you all for a profit.
translation.it: Kai era un bugiardo e un ladro che stava per vendervi.

translation.en: Anything more you want, General?
Don't call me General.
Hey, you see it?
There.
That's our village.
Home.
[Kora] Home.
I never had a place to put to the word.
translation.it: Non ho mai avuto un posto da chiamare così.

translation.en: It's almost a shame you killed that son-of-a-bitch Noble
translation.it: È quasi un peccato che tu abbia ucciso Noble

translation.en: and we don't have to fight.
This would've been a beautiful place to die.
translation.it: Sarebbe stato un bel posto dove morire.

translation.en: Yes, it would.
Let's go.
[technician 1] Ready him for transmission. Balisarius is standing by.
translation.it: Preparatelo per il collegamento. Balisarius è in attesa.

translation.en: [technician 2] Sir, should we stabilize him first?
[technician 1] No, we will not keep the Regent waiting.
translation.it: No. Non faremo aspettare il Reggente.

translation.en: Neurolink.
-[cable clicks] -[technician 2] Link is established.
[technician1] Connection complete.
Signal is strong.
[technician 1] Send him.
Master.
I have found her.
I have found Arthelais.
The Scargiver.
-You're certain it's her? -I am, my Lord.
translation.it: - Sicuro che sia lei? - Sì, mio signore.

translation.en: She was in the company of the disgraced General Titus and Darrian Bloodaxe.
translation.it: Era insieme al disonorato Generale Titus e a Darrian Bloodaxe.

translation.en: We are close to capturing them.
Tell me, Commander. Did you think that this would be good news?
translation.it: Dica, Comandante, ha pensato che fosse una buona notizia

translation.en: That my daughter, Arthelais,
one of the most dangerous and decorated warriors
translation.it: uno dei guerrieri più pericolosi e decorati

translation.en: in the history of armed conflict, is now part of a blossoming insurgency?
translation.it: nella storia del conflitto armato, faccia ora parte di un nuovo esercito ribelle?

translation.en: I'm supposed to be happy
that she's joined forces with the genius battlefield commander, General Titus?
translation.it: che abbia unito le forze col Generale Titus, un genio militare?

translation.en: Sir, she is within our grasp.
Let me bring you her head.
[Balisarius] In truth, I fear the head most endangered here is yours.
translation.it: Temo che la testa più a rischio, qui, sia la sua.

translation.en: You will crush this insurgency to the last man, do you hear me?
translation.it: Sederà questa rivolta massacrando fino all'ultimo uomo, capito?

translation.en: And then you will capture my daughter alive
and bring back my precious child to me.
translation.it: e mi riporterà la mia preziosa figlia.

translation.en: So that I may crucify her in the shadow of the Senate.
translation.it: Così che io possa crocifiggerla all'ombra del Senato.

translation.en: If you cannot bring her to me,
then the one whose public execution will send shivers down the spines of the senators,
translation.it: la persona la cui pubblica esecuzione farà tremare i senatori

translation.en: and whose screams will echo down its marbled halls
translation.it: e le cui urla riecheggeranno nei suoi corridoi di marmo

translation.en: will be yours.
[technician 1] Did he make it back?
[technician 2] I don't know. I have no heartbeat or brain function.
translation.it: Non lo so. Niente battito o funzioni cerebrali.

translation.en: [technician 1] Hit him with everything.
